info.name: LoveAndLaw Backend API
info.description:
Complete API collection for LoveAndLaw - A 24x7 family law assistant that empowers users during difficult moments.

## Overview
This collection contains all endpoints for the LoveAndLaw backend including:
- Health check endpoints
- Lawyer matching API
- User profile management
- WebSocket chat interface
- Admin operations

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. In development mode, authentication can be bypassed by setting `DEBUG_MODE=true`.

## Base URLs
- **Production REST API**: https://j73lfhja1d.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production
- **Production WebSocket**: wss://vduwddf9yg.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production
- **Local Development**: http://localhost:8000

## Important Notes
- All user text is automatically redacted for PII protection
- AI responses are streamed for better UX
- The system includes 14 specialized legal agents
- Therapeutic engine provides emotional support alongside legal guidance

item.name: Lawyer Matching (Optional)
item.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è NOTE: Lawyer matching happens AUTOMATICALLY during chat conversations. This endpoint is optional for standalone search functionality.

request.description:
## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Lawyer Matching is Primarily Internal

**This endpoint is OPTIONAL.** Lawyer matching happens automatically during chat conversations via WebSocket when:
- User provides location (ZIP code)
- Legal needs are identified
- User mentions "lawyer", "attorney", "legal help"
- User is not in crisis (distress < 7)

### When to Use This Endpoint:
- Building a standalone "Find a Lawyer" page
- Quick search functionality outside of chat
- Testing lawyer matching independently
- Pre-fetching lawyers before starting chat

### Primary Method (Via WebSocket):
During chat, lawyers are automatically matched and sent as:
```json
{
  "type": "cards",
  "cid": "msg-123",
  "cards": [/* lawyer recommendations */]
}
```

### This REST Endpoint (Secondary/Optional):

**Requires authentication** (unless in debug mode)

### Request Body:
- `facts` (required): Object containing matching criteria
  - `zip` (string): User's ZIP code for location-based matching
  - `practice_areas` (array): List of legal practice areas needed
    - Valid values: `divorce`, `child_custody`, `child_support`, `property_division`, `spousal_support`, `domestic_violence`, `adoption`, `guardianship`, `paternity`, `juvenile`, `restraining_orders`
  - `budget_range` (string): Budget tier
    - `$`: Low budget
    - `$$`: Medium budget
    - `$$$`: High budget
  - `search_text` (string): Free text for semantic search
- `limit` (integer): Number of results (1-20, default: 5)

### Response Example:
```json
{
  "cards": [
    {
      "id": "lawyer-123",
      "name": "Sarah Johnson",
      "firm": "Johnson Family Law",
      "match_score": 0.95,
      "blurb": "20+ years specializing in complex custody cases",
      "link": "https://example.com/lawyer/123",
      "practice_areas": ["divorce", "child_custody"],
      "location": {
        "city": "San Francisco",
        "state": "CA",
        "zip": "94105"
      },
      "rating": 4.8,
      "reviews_count": 127,
      "budget_range": "$$"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Matching Algorithm:
1. Location-based filtering (ZIP code proximity)
2. Practice area matching
3. Budget compatibility
4. Semantic search on lawyer profiles
5. Scoring based on ratings and reviews

Retrieve a user's profile including legal situation, milestones, and preferences.

**Requires authentication**
- Users can only access their own profile
- Admins can access any profile

### Response Example:
```json
{
  "profile": {
    "user_id": "test-user-123",
    "created_at": "2024-01-10T08:00:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2024-01-10T10:30:00Z",
    "legal_situation": {
      "practice_areas": ["divorce", "child_custody"],
      "state": "CA",
      "urgency": "medium",
      "case_details": "Seeking divorce with joint custody"
    },
    "milestones_completed": [
      "initial_consultation",
      "paperwork_started",
      "lawyer_contacted"
    ],
    "current_goals": [
      "File divorce petition",
      "Establish custody agreement"
    ],
    "preferences": {
      "communication_style": "supportive",
      "reminder_frequency": "weekly",
      "preferred_contact": "chat"
    },
    "average_distress_score": 6.2,
    "average_engagement_level": 7.8
  }
}
```

### Profile Fields:
- `legal_situation`: Current legal needs and case details
- `milestones_completed`: Progress tracking through legal process
- `current_goals`: Active objectives in the legal journey
- `preferences`: User preferences for interaction style
- `average_distress_score`: Emotional state tracking (0-10)
- `average_engagement_level`: User engagement metric (0-10)

item.name: Admin Operations
item.description: Administrative endpoints for managing system data

request.description:
Upload lawyer data via CSV file for bulk import.

**Requires admin authentication**

### CSV Format:
Required columns:
- `id`: Unique lawyer identifier
- `name`: Lawyer's full name
- `firm`: Law firm name

Optional columns:
- `practice_areas`: Comma-separated list (e.g., "divorce,custody")
- `zip`: ZIP code
- `city`: City name
- `state`: State code
- `description`: Profile description
- `budget_range`: $, $$, or $$$
- `rating`: Numeric rating (0-5)
- `reviews_count`: Number of reviews

### Example CSV:
```csv
id,name,firm,practice_areas,zip,city,state,budget_range,rating
lawyer-1,Jane Smith,Smith Legal,"divorce,custody",94105,San Francisco,CA,$$,4.8
lawyer-2,John Doe,Doe & Associates,"adoption,guardianship",10001,New York,NY,$$$,4.9
```

### Response Example:
```json
{
  "status": "completed",
  "indexed_count": 245,
  "errors": [
    {
      "row": 15,
      "error": "Missing required field: firm"
    }
  ]
}
```

item.name: WebSocket Chat Testing
item.description: WebSocket testing for the therapeutic chat interface. This is the PRIMARY feature of LoveAndLaw.

request.description:
## WebSocket Testing in Postman

### Prerequisites
- **Postman v8.5+** required for WebSocket support
- Click "New" ‚Üí "WebSocket Request" in Postman

### Connection Steps

1. **Connect to WebSocket**
   - URL: `wss://vduwddf9yg.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/production`
   - Click "Connect"
   - You should receive: `{"type": "connection_established", "message": "Connected to Love & Law chat"}`

2. **Send Authentication** (Optional in debug mode)
   ```json
   {
     "type": "auth",
     "user_id": "test-user-123",
     "conversation_id": "conv-456"
   }
   ```

3. **Start Conversation**
   ```json
   {
     "type": "user_msg",
     "cid": "msg-001",
     "text": "I need help with divorce proceedings in California"
   }
   ```

### Expected Response Flow
1. `message_received` - Acknowledgment
2. `ai_chunk` - Multiple streaming chunks
3. `ai_complete` - End of AI response
4. `cards` - Lawyer recommendations (if applicable)
5. `suggestions` - Follow-up questions

### Important Notes
- Lawyer matching happens AUTOMATICALLY when you mention location + legal needs
- Keep connection alive with heartbeat every 25 seconds
- All user text is automatically redacted for PII

## WebSocket Test Scenarios

Copy these messages to test different features:

### 1. Basic Legal Help
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-001",
  "text": "I'm thinking about getting divorced and don't know where to start"
}
```

### 2. Trigger Lawyer Matching
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-002",
  "text": "I need a divorce lawyer in San Francisco 94105"
}
```
**Expected**: Automatic `cards` message with lawyer recommendations

### 3. Child Custody Concern
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-003",
  "text": "My ex wants to take our kids out of state. I'm in ZIP 94105."
}
```
**Expected**: Custody advice + automatic lawyer matching

### 4. Safety/Crisis Situation
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-004",
  "text": "My spouse is threatening me and I'm scared for my safety"
}
```
**Expected**: SafetyAgent activates with resources

### 5. Property Division
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-005",
  "text": "How is property divided in a California divorce?"
}
```

### 6. Multiple Legal Issues
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-006",
  "text": "I need help with divorce, custody, and spousal support in 94105"
}
```
**Expected**: Comprehensive response + lawyer cards

### 7. Emotional Support
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-007",
  "text": "I'm feeling overwhelmed by this whole divorce process"
}
```
**Expected**: Therapeutic response + reflection prompts

### 8. Heartbeat (Keep-Alive)
```json
{
  "type": "heartbeat"
}
```
**Send every 25 seconds to maintain connection**

## WebSocket Message Templates

### Authentication Message
```json
{
  "type": "auth",
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",
  "conversation_id": "{{conversation_id}}"
}
```

### User Message Template
```json
{
  "type": "user_msg",
  "cid": "msg-{{$timestamp}}",
  "text": "Your message here"
}
```

### Heartbeat
```json
{
  "type": "heartbeat"
}
```

## Response Message Types

### Connection Established
```json
{
  "type": "connection_established",
  "message": "Connected to Love & Law chat"
}
```

### AI Response (Streaming)
```json
{
  "type": "ai_chunk",
  "cid": "msg-001",
  "text": "I understand you're going through..."
}
```

### Lawyer Cards (Automatic)
```json
{
  "type": "cards",
  "cid": "msg-001",
  "cards": [
    {
      "id": "lawyer-123",
      "name": "Sarah Johnson",
      "firm": "Johnson Family Law",
      "match_score": 0.95,
      "blurb": "Perfect for your needs...",
      "practice_areas": ["divorce", "custody"],
      "location": {
        "city": "San Francisco",
        "state": "CA",
        "zip": "94105"
      },
      "rating": 4.8,
      "budget_range": "$$"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Suggestions
```json
{
  "type": "suggestions",
  "cid": "msg-001",
  "questions": [
    "What are the residency requirements for divorce in California?",
    "How long does the divorce process typically take?",
    "What documents do I need to file for divorce?"
  ]
}
```

### Reflection Prompts
```json
{
  "type": "reflection",
  "cid": "msg-001",
  "reflection_type": "emotional",
  "prompt": "You mentioned feeling overwhelmed. What specific aspects of the divorce process are causing you the most stress?",
  "insights": ["Taking things one step at a time can help manage overwhelming feelings"]
}
```
